table.name: vtiger_spreadsheets
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_spreadsheets` ( `spreadsheetsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `spreadsheetsname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `spreadsheetsno` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `module1` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `othercolumns` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `modulecolumns` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`spreadsheetsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_spreadsheetscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_spreadsheetscf` ( `spreadsheetsid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`spreadsheetsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
